io.micronaut.neo4j.bolt.embedded

Class EmbeddedNeo4jServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.neo4j.bolt.embedded.EmbeddedNeo4jServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.micronaut.context.event.BeanCreatedEventListener<Neo4jBoltConfiguration>, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.util.EventListener

    @Singleton
 @Requires(classes=org.neo4j.harness.ServerControls.class)
public class EmbeddedNeo4jServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements io.micronaut.context.event.BeanCreatedEventListener<Neo4jBoltConfiguration>, java.io.Closeable
    Starts an embedded Neo4j server if no server is running for the configured settings.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    graemerocher
